meanings.sent1: She reships the package to the customer for free.
meanings.sent2: The online store reships orders if they arrive damaged.
meanings.sent3: He reships the items with care to ensure they reach their destination safely.
meanings.sent4: The company reships products promptly to meet customer expectations.
meanings.sent5: Reships quickly to avoid delays in delivery.

meanings.definition: To send back or return a shipment.
meanings.sent1: Customers reships items that don't meet their expectations.
meanings.sent2: The buyer reships the damaged goods for a refund.
meanings.sent3: She reships the wrong order and apologizes for the inconvenience.
meanings.sent4: The company reships the package due to a shipping error.
meanings.sent5: Reships the package to the sender with a note explaining the return.

meanings.sent1: The reships of the products increased after the holiday season.
meanings.sent2: He handles the reships of orders with efficiency and accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The reships of the damaged items surprised the warehouse staff.
meanings.sent4: The company's reships process ensures customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The reships of the returned items require careful documentation.
